summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Lakewood Avenue, from the south line of Lot 3 of Block 63 and Lot 22 of Block 69 of Mt. Baker Park Addition to the City of Seattle, to the north line of Lot "A" of Block 68 of Mt. Baker Park Addition to the City of Seattle, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and constructing concrete walks, in accordance with Resolution No. 1951 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
